Isaiah or Isaias__34.4__And all the host of the heavens: : That is, the sun, moon, and stars.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.5__Idumea: : Under the name of Idumea, or Edom a people that were enemies of the Jews, are here understood the wicked in general, the enemies of God and his church.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.7__The unicorns: : That is, the great and mighty.
Isaiah or Isaias__34.8__The year of recompenses: : When the persecutors of Sion, that is, of the church, shall receive their reward.
